fields.body:
A brave says hello to the lady sitting at the bar.

He knows his strong points.

He believes in his guts.

A coward sits and watches the lady from the sideline.

He knows his weak points.

He fears rejection.

Thinking of giving the exam with only a month left.

Coward: I will not be able to clear this come what may.
Brave: You provide with the material to study. I will make sure I will clear this exam.

(Pre notes : Based on true events)

He : Yeah, so we are splitting the bills right.

She : Yeah.

He : How much was left? How much do I have to pay.

She : That was 760 rupees as a whole, then the ola rides and other stuff was 200.

He : Yeah haan.

She : Ummmmm…. So this narrows down to…….

He : Yeahhhhh?

She : One kiss. Yeah thats all you have to give.

Footnotes : Kiss paid the bills. I am a man of culture!

:)

Traffic rules are made to break.
We love to fight for few rupees in vegetable market but we don’t like to fight for our rights.
We like to save our daughters, mother, wife and sister from harassment but if we see the girl, we stare at her continuously and make her feel embarrass.
Zebra crossing is just a design on road. Marley, people use it.
Indian whether is as like as girls’ mood. It can be swings anytime.
Bundles of rupees and gold are offered in temples to please the god but people think thousands of time to donate the same to a needy.

Slum areas before mega and metro city stations.
Nude children on the street.
Spit on buildings and walls.
Healthy persons in handicap coach in train.
"Skills" performances on the streets and "Luck" reigns in palaces in India.
